name: Tooltip - Auto Layout  plus Variants
description:
This file complements @chudoloo Auto layout tooltip solution with Figma Variants feature.


There are four properties:

  • Light&Dark mode
  • Type: standard, dismissable, with and without a title
  • Beak position
  • Manual resize mode


Known issues

Due to some AL tricks text content is not preserved when you switch between:

  • Auto layout \ Manual resize variants
  • 8:00 - 1:00 \ 2:00 - 7:00 beak positions
